text: ninnal kilakkeattea patinnareattea ‎mukhantirikkunnatalla punyam. pinneyea, ‎allahuvilum antyadinattilum malakkukalilum ‎vedagranthattilum pravacakanmarilum visvasikkuka; ‎sampattineat ere priyamuntayirikke at ‎atutta bandhukkalkkum anathakalkkum agatikalkkum ‎valiyatrakkarkkum ceadiccuvarunnavarkkum atima ‎meacanattinum celavalikkuka; namaskaram ‎nisthayeate nirvahikkuka; sakatt nalkuka; ‎kararukalilerppettalava palikkuka; ‎pratisandhikalilum vipadghattannalilum yud'dharangattum ‎ksama palikkuka; innane ceyyunnavaran ‎punyavanmar. avaran satyam paliccavar. avar ‎tanneyan yathartha bhaktanmar. ‎
